availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bookkeeper. Native of Ireland. Son of Ann Boyle. Married to Marietta A. Tyler Boyle in Wayne County, New York, on December 9, 1857. Father of Edward L. Boyle. Bookkeeper in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Bookkeeper in Louisville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, New York, Monroe County, Rochester, District 225, p. 496C.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 9, Jefferson County, Kentucky, 1863.
Parish Marriage Records of Zion Church, 1823-1871, Palmyra, New York. Marriage of Edward Crooke Boyle and Marietta A. Tyler, 1857, Episcopal Diocese of Rochester Church Records, Rochester, NY.
